title: Revenue of Johnson & Johnson 's pharmaceuticals segment worldwide 2012 to 2024
summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 5 lines denoting Immunology, Cardiovascular/Metabolism/Other, Oncology, Central nervous system, and Anti-infectives. The y axis indicates the Revenue in billion U.S. dollars and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall Immunology, Cardiovascular/Metabolism/Other, Oncology, Central nervous system, and Anti-infectives are roughly constant,  throughout the Year
Throughout the period, Oncology generally had the highest Revenue in billion U.S. dollars relative to others with an average of 83.81, and it reached its maximum at 2019 with a value of 988.0.
After Oncology, Immunology overall has the second highest values , with a mean value of 10.8, peaking at 2019.
The botommost line, Anti-infectives,  has a mean of 4.16, and peaked at 2024.
